note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Force any window to be (or not to be) on top of other windows
body:
ï»¿A small utility to make a window to be (or not to be) on top of other windows.
No installation required.

Usage:
Hold Win button and click anywhere in the window you want to pin on top of other windows.
Use the same action (Win+left button click) to unpin a pinned window.
name: PinWindow
